title: Nonviolent Communication and Peace Practice Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of communication and conflict management
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented design applicable to everyday conflict situations for in-service practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain the definition of peace in three dimensions (individual-relational-societal).
Learners can apply nonviolent communication skills (observation-feelings-needs-requests) with 80% accuracy in conflict situations.
Learners can analyze five daily practices of peace and identify at least three role models.

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Discussion Board, Assignment Submission System)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
